job.title: Junior Software Engineer
job.description: Babylist is an ecommerce and gifting platform for new parents and parentstobe We are a rapidly growing business looking for talented contributors to join our seasoned crossdiscipline teambrbrOur web application and backend systems are at the center of the Babylist experience  an experience our users love as they prepare for one of lifes biggest eventsbrbrThe Babylist engineering culture is one of learning and knowledge sharing We are passionate about experimentation automation and shipping value to our customers Our stack is based on Ruby on Rails and React We continue to expand our toolbox to use the best technologies for the jobbrbrWho You ArebrulliYou find joy in debugging and pride in hunting down and squashing bugsliliYou enjoy working with multiple teams and being the goto person for your teammates when they need supportliliYou get excited empowering others by building the tools they need to do their jobs more efficiently liliYou have the confidence to communicate something technical to a nontechnical team member you know how to cut out the jargon and talk to others in the ways theyll understand bestliliYou value collaboration and working with a strong teamliliYou understand testing monitoring and running a production software systemliliYou know how to roll up your sleeves we like systems that run well but when things dont go as planned we support each otherbrliulWhat Youll DobrulliWork closely with team members across different roles and departments and become the point person for technical requestsliliTrack and identify issues affecting both our users and other Babylist employees and build tools and solutions to make peoples lives easierliliFacilitate and triage internal requests related to our business needsliliReduce toil by investing in long term solutions to frequent requests or complaints liliCommunicate new product launches and updates to our Customer Service team so they can provide better service to our usersliliSupport other engineers by writing scripts and building tools to service backend requests and make development easierliliLearn and grow as an EngineerbrliulWhat Youve Donebrulli23 years of engineering experience with a proven track record of building consumer web applications or servicesliliSolid fluency in at least one of Ruby Python or another modern programming languageliliBachelors Degree in Engineering Computer Science or related field or relevant experience is a bonus this role requires a concrete understanding of CS fundamentalsliliExperience with RubyRails and AWS a plusliliDemonstrated experience working fully remote with a team also a plusbrliulstrongOur Tech StackbrstrongulliRuby on RailsliliReactliliMySQLliliRedisliliSidekiqliliAWSbrliulstronguAbout BabylistbrbrustrongAt Babylist we help expecting parents get exactly what they need for the arrival of their new baby Founded in 2011 Babylist is a popular baby gift registry in the US We serve millions of families every year to help them make the journey to parenthood less overwhelming and more fun Families can add any item from any store to their registry including products Babylist directly sells alongside meaningful gifts like babysitting and meals which they cant buy in stores The baby retail market is underserved and Babylist is well positioned to be the trusted brand that helps new families through this monumental life stage In the US alone 4 million babies are born every year and we have over 15 million new families signing up to create a baby registry with us annually This year 10M loved ones will give the perfect gift using BabylistbrbrstrongWhy You Will Love Working at Babylistbrstrongulli We get stuff donelili We have a real impact on peoples liveslili Were passionate about our users and we genuinely appreciate themlili We work at a sustainable pace for longterm success yes were profitablelili We are growing and have meaningful opportunities for career advancementlili Were a technological and resultsdriven businesslili We believe in autonomy and reward taking initiativelili We have experienced leadership that is always open to new ideasbrliulstrongBenefitsbrstrongulli Competitive paylili Competitive health benefits including companyfunded medical dental and visionlili 401k FSA plans and disability insurancelili Flexible paid parental leave policylili MacBook Pro tools that youll need to be successful and remote working stipend for office setuplili Companywide events and meetings to connect with the broader Babylist teamlili We work at a sustainable pace in general we dont work late or on weekendsbrliulemIf your experience is close to what were looking for please consider applying Experience comes in many forms  skills are transferable and passion goes a long way We know that diversity makes for the best problemsolving and creative thinking which is why were dedicated to adding new perspectives to the team and encourage everyone to applyem
